Name: Treasure from the Land of Wisdom
Desc: A bookshelf often found in the House of Daena that contains large numbers of Akademiya-approved books. These shelves are usually placed next to white stone walls to create majestic, towering walls of books. As many books are obscure and difficult to understand, some scholars can't even get through one wall in their lifetime...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
